References

EGNO
Pavel Etingof, Shlomo Gelaki, Dmitri Nikshych, Victor Ostrik, Tensor categories, American Mathematical Soc., 2016.
maeurer2022
Fabian Mäurer, Developing a Category Theory Framework in Julia, Master's thesis, TU Kaiserslautern, 2022.
mac2013categories
Saunders Mac Lane, Categories for the working mathematician, Springer Science \& Business Media, 1971.
Notes
Ulrich Thiel, Introduction to Categorical Thinking and Categorification, \url{https://ulthiel.com/math/wp-content/uploads/lecture-notes/Tensor-Categories.pdf}, 2021. Online; v0.1.
subfactors
Michael Müger, From subfactors to categories and topology II: The quantum double of tensor categories and subfactors, Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra, 180(1), 159-219, 2003.
Liam
Liam Rogel, Monoidal Categories of Equivariant Coherent Sheaves on Finite Sets, Master's thesis, Technische Universität Kaiserslautern, 2021.
TAMBARA1998692
Daisuke Tambara, Shigeru Yamagami, Tensor Categories with Fusion Rules of Self-Duality for Finite Abelian Groups, Journal of Algebra, 209(2), 692-707, 1998.
thielweb
Ulrich Thiel, Comments on the book “Tensor Categories” by Etingof–Gelaki– Nikshych–Ostrik, 2021.
lusztig1987leading
George Lusztig, Leading coefficients of character values of Hecke algebras, In Proc. Symp. Pure Math, 235–262, 1987.
drinfeld2010braided
Vladimir Drinfeld, Shlomo Gelaki, Dmitri Nikshych, Victor Ostrik, On braided fusion categories I, Selecta Mathematica, 16(1), 1–119, 2010.
ncat:skeleton
nLab, skeleton,
ncat:continuous
nLab, adjoints preserve (co-)limits,
huang2014braided
Hua-Lin Huang, Gongxiang Liu, Yu Ye, The braided monoidal structures on a class of linear Gr-categories, Algebras and Representation Theory, 17(4), 1249–1265, 2014.
MeatAxe
Michael Ringe, The MeatAxe - Computing with Modular Representations.,
fein1968lifting
Burton Fein, Lifting modular representations of finite groups, Proceedings of the American Mathematical Society, 19(1), 217–221, 1968.
wolf2021microscopic
Ramona Wolf, Microscopic models for fusion categories, arXiv preprint arXiv:2101.04154, 2021.
VercleyenSingerland
Gert Vercleyen, Joost Slingerland, On Low Rank Fusion Rings, 2022.
kirillov2010turaevviro
Alexander Kirillov Jr. au2, Benjamin Balsam, Turaev-Viro invariants as an extended TQFT, arXiv:1004.1533 [math.GT].
